com.rattat.micro.game.aster.mvc
Interface ShipListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
SoundManager, VibrationManager
public interface ShipListener

Defines an interface which objects wishing to observe ship events must implement.

Events are defined using the public static integers like EVENT_THRUST_START and EVENT_MISSILE_FIRED which are defined in this interface.

Author:
william@rattat.com

Field Summary
static int EVENT_MISSILE_FIRED
          A missile has been fired by the ship
static int EVENT_THRUST_START
          Thruster on the ship has been fired
static int EVENT_THRUST_STOP
          Thruster on the ship has been stopped

Method Detail

shipEvent

void shipEvent(int event,
               Model model)

Objects who wish to observe game events fired by the ShipController class must implement this interface

Objects can see and alter the state of the game by performing operations on the model parameter.

Parameters:
event - The event that has been fired
model - The model of the game
See Also:
GameController.addListener(GameListener listener)
